Wanagiri Hidden Hill

The location of Wanagiri Hidden Hill is located on Munduk Street, Wanagiri, Sukasada, Pancasari, Buleleng Regency. The location is located a bit far in the highlands and if you want to go here, you will also pass very beautiful tourist destinations such as Ulun Danu Beratan Temple and Iconic Handara Gate, you can also stop by these tourist destinations if you are heading to Wanagiri hidden hill this. History Name Wanagiri

The origin of the word wana giri comes from the word, which is where the word Wana means forest and Giri which means hill, and the word wanagiri means hill of forest. in this place it is still natural, many shady trees and animals such as birds and sometimes there are apes in these hills. The growing tourism in Bali, by local residents, this place was transformed into a tourist attraction where from this place we can enjoy the beautiful natural scenery and also in this place provided some facilities for taking pictures like swing, nest bird and others. As for the natural scenery that can be seen from this hill, namely the view of twin lake view and unspoiled tropical forest. With a location located in the hills with a view of the Tamblingan lake that is so beautiful with a stretch of lake water that is so clear and also around the lake there is a small forest that is so enchanting, it's no wonder that this hidden hill Wanagiri tourist destination is always visited by foreign and domestic tourists. , because the charm offered is very tempting. As a very popular photo spot with a very enchanting lake view

Why is Called Wanagiri Hidden Hill

As for why it is called the name Wanagiri hidden hill, it refers to its location, which is located in the village of Wanagiri which offers a lot of natural charm that is still very natural and very beautiful. Hidden because it is located in an area far from urban areas, which is located in a very natural countryside and hidden from the hustle and bustle of urban life with an unspoiled natural and forest atmosphere, Hill refers to its location which is located in very beautiful hills and from the top of this hill. we can see the scenery below which is so perfect, you won't regret coming here Wanagiri Hidden Hills is one of the new tourist attractions in Bali that is still unknown to many people. Did you know that the beauty and beauty of scenery in Wanagiri Hidden Hills offers an exotic and truly extraordinary romanticism. Wanagiri Hidden Hill Photo Spot

As you know that the wanagiri tourist destination is a place to enjoy the very beautiful view of tamblingan lake, because tamblingan lake offers beautiful views, then a place to take pictures is made with a lake background which is very pleasing to the eye when you see it. This kind of scenery is very rare, where you can see a very fantastically beautiful nature, especially if it is immortalized in a photo. This is the place where there are lots of photos that you can use while visiting here, offering a very beautiful charm that will complete the atmosphere of your tour in Wanagiri hidden hill. As for some of the photo spots in Wanagiri hidden hill that you can use to take pictures, they are as follows:

  • Swing for foto: Swing only use for photo, not actual doing the swing, get in to the swing vehicle that is above the peak height of Wanagiri Hidden Hills Bali with background of the hill and the beauty of Lake Buyan and Tamblingan which are surrounded by lush green forests and trees. is perfect sopt for taking picture. The resulting photo will be very instagramable, where you sit together and are photographed with a very beautiful background, very suitable for newly married couples to add spices to their love relationship
  • Bird Nest: one of the most Instagramable photo spots that is a favorite of visitors is the Bird Nest atau Sangkar Burung that you must try while in Wanagiri Hidden Hills, enjoy taking pictures in a bird cage with background twin lake view. Bird's nest has always been a very favorite spot among photo hunters, because the resulting photos are so picturesque, with a very beautiful background of the twin lake view will making the photos very instagramable and definitely will get a lot of likes on instagram
  • Heart: a heart made of rattan, which has a hole in the middle and there is a seat in the middle of the heart, with a very beautiful tamblingan lake in the background. You can sit in the middle and take pictures with a very dazzling background. This one photo spot is perfect for couples who are just in a relationship, which will add to the intimacy, with the heart symbol which is also a symbol of love will make the atmosphere very romantic, and coupled with the photos that are so charming will make you a very beautiful couple match
  • Gate: the gate is made of rattan, and there is a seat in the middle of the gate that is hung by a rope, you can take pictures here with the background of tamblingan lake and hills, making the scenery even more beautiful. This gate is very beautiful and suitable for those of you who want to feel a different sensation where sitting on a gate that has a swing and while looking at the lake will make the photos very beautiful. With a view of the blue lake and green forest and equipped with a blue sky, it will make your day too colorful
  • Boat: a boat made of bamboo, here you can take pictures with the same background, namely Tamblingan lake which is so enchanting, our guide will always help you if you need help in taking photos. This photo spot may look a bit different where you can take pictures on a boat like a titanic film with a blue expanse of lake and green forest that is so enchanting that it will complete your adventure in Wanagiri hidden hill which is phenomenal and famous for its Instagram photo spots.
